Initial Model Proposal

-   

-   $X_{1,i}$: Age Group
-   $X_{2,i}$: Race
-   $\eta_{0,j[i]}$: State level effect

$$
\text{logit}(p_i) = 
\log \left( \frac{P(Y_i = 1 | \mathbf{X}_i)}{1 - P(Y_i = 1 | \mathbf{X}_i)} \right) = \beta_{0,j[i]} +\eta_{0,j[i]} + \beta_{1,j[i]}X_{1,i}+\beta_{2,j[i]}X_{2,i}
$$
